title: Font Identifying
content:
Hello, i’m new here..anyway, I am looking for a font and have absolutely no idea where to begin, so if you guys can look at this link:  
 [http://www.interpolnyc.com/extras/wallpapers/wallpaper01\_1280x800.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044750/http:/www.interpolnyc.com/extras/wallpapers/wallpaper01_1280x800.jpg "http://www.interpolnyc.com/extras/wallpapers/wallpaper01\_1280x800.jpg")

-I’m looking for the “Our love to admire”-font. It looks kinda customized but at least something familiar, especially interested in a font where the M and A’s is italic, but still regular..

A swedish magazine called PLAZA use this font or something familiar a lot if anyone is familiar with it....

Any help would be greatly appreciated! :)

 [‹ Barlow by Dalton Maag](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044750/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39263 "Go to previous forum topic") [Magazine redesign - separating text from image. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044750/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39287 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ultrasonic

comments.content:
Since you seem interested, here are some tips to learn to ID fonts for yourself (even tho you’d put us out of business)

[http://typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q\_14](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044750/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_14 "http://typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q\_14")

for those, who want to identify font

[www.identifont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122044750/http:/www.identifont.com/ "www.identifont.com")
